alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Iron; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 3:19PM EST until December 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Two- day total snow accumulations of 12 to 20 inches are expected over higher terrain near Lake Superior through Saturday. Total snow amounts will taper to 4 to 8 inches over the southeast half of Iron County. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will occasionally cause whiteout conditions in blowing snow near Lake Superior. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches through this evening. * WHERE...Baraga, Iron and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 1 AM Friday to 7 PM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to near impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
